mapper.sql: userId, brithday, gender, registerTime, nickname, headPicture, points, money
mapper.insert: insert into user_detail (userId, brithday, gender, registerTime, nickname, headPicture, points, money) values (#{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{brithday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{points,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

userId,

mapper.update:
update user_detail
brithday = #{brithday,jdbcType=DATE},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT},
registerTime = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
headPicture = #{headPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
points = #{points,jdbcType=BIGINT},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where userId = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
